data.text0: Part I: Determining Strategies and Response Plan
data.text1: Major Fletcher and MSgt Washington talking
data.text2:
MSgt Washington determines that they should calculate maximum stay times within
the radiological storage area before the team enters the building for further surveying.

Complete the calculations that MSgt Washington will use to determine the amount of time the team can be within 2 ft of the Cs-137 source without triggering the dose alarm on their EPDs. Refer to her notes on the clipboard for required information. (The clipboard can be reposiitoned while you work.)

Click the Next button to display each step of the calculation. To complete each step of the calculation, type in the appropriate values in the spaces indicated, and click Calculate.
data.text4:
You determine that you should calculate maximum stay times within the radiological storage area before the team enters the building for further surveying.

Complete the calculations that you will use to determine the amount of time the team can be within 2 ft of the Cs-137 source without triggering the dose alarm on their EPDs. Refer to your notes on the clipboard for required information. (The clipboard can be reposiitoned while you work.)

Click the Next button to display each step of the calculation. To complete each step of the calculation, type in the appropriate values in the spaces indicated, and click Calculate.
